author: Frances Martel, Frances Martel
title: Brazilian Official Mocks Chinese Accent, Demands Sale of 1,000 Respirators for an Apology
description: Brazilian Minister of Education Abraham Weintraub promised to apologize to the Chinese government on Monday if Beijing offered to sell 1,000 respirators to the South American country.
content:
Brazilian Minister of Education Abraham Weintraub promised to apologize to the Chinese government on Monday if Beijing offered to sell 1,000 respirators to the South American country.
Weintraub had outraged the Communist Party embassy in Brasilia with a twee… [+6069 chars]
